CustomField.formula: SUBSTITUTE(IF ( Aircraft_Ref__c <>'', IF( Aircraft_Ref__r.Base_City__c <> '',Aircraft_Ref__r.Base_City__c ,'-')& IF(TEXT(Aircraft_Ref__r.State__c)<> '',' ,'&TEXT(Aircraft_Ref__r.State__c) ,'-')& IF(TEXT(Aircraft_Ref__r.Cntry__c)<> '', ' ,'&TEXT(Aircraft_Ref__r.Cntry__c) ,'-') , '-' ), ', ,', ',' )
CustomField.label: Aircraft Location
